程序包 org.janusgraph.diskstorage.util.time

接口 TimestampProvider

所有已知实现类:
TimestampProviders
public interface TimestampProvider
System time interface that abstracts time units, resolution, and measurements of time.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    Instant getTime()
    Returns the current time based on this timestamp provider as a Instant.
    Instant getTime​(long sinceEpoch)
    Returns the given time as a Instant based off of this timestamp providers units
    long getTime​(Instant timestamp)
    Returns the scalar value for this instant given the configured time unit
    Timer getTimer()
    Returns a Timer based on this timestamp provider
    ChronoUnit getUnit()
    Return the units of getTime().
    void sleepFor​(Duration duration)
    Sleep for the given duration of time.
    Instant sleepPast​(Instant futureTime)
    Block until the current time as returned by getTime() is greater than the given timepoint.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getTime

      Instant getTime()
      Returns the current time based on this timestamp provider as a Instant.
      返回:

    • getTime

      Instant getTime​(long sinceEpoch)
      Returns the given time as a Instant based off of this timestamp providers units
      参数:
      sinceEpoch -
      返回:

    • getUnit

      ChronoUnit getUnit()
      Return the units of getTime(). This method's return value must be constant over at least the life of the object implementing this interface.
      返回:
      this instance's time unit

    • sleepPast

      Instant sleepPast​(Instant futureTime) throws InterruptedException
      Block until the current time as returned by getTime() is greater than the given timepoint.
      参数:
      futureTime - The time to sleep past
      返回:
      the current time in the same units as the unit argument
      抛出:
      InterruptedException - if externally interrupted

    • sleepFor

      void sleepFor​(Duration duration) throws InterruptedException
      Sleep for the given duration of time.
      参数:
      duration -
      抛出:
      InterruptedException

    • getTimer

      Timer getTimer()
      Returns a Timer based on this timestamp provider
      返回:

    • getTime

      long getTime​(Instant timestamp)
      Returns the scalar value for this instant given the configured time unit
      参数:
      timestamp -
      返回:
